Articles.Content:
Looks like you took some inspiration from Salvation MkII for the back side

It was really just cramping around the engines, to save armor and cover them XD

UPDATE: Added RCS and took of a bunch of struts, she's a little heavier, but only 581 parts.

'Tis but a flesh wound...'

Javascript is disabled. View full album

(The plane literally fell apart when I tried to turn... the missile did its job. )

I'm seeing an increase in part counts across the board here. Zekes' dreks in the upper 500s, Scriptkitt3h's 810 part battleship, and a new battleship I'm working on has 600 parts and isn't even armed... Makes me wonder what effect lag has on missile effectiveness. Is it a defensive or offensive benefit?

Scoot over Spartwo, You've got company

... by the way, you wouldn't happen to have any fuel, would you? Even with two 20-Ton drop tanks I'm on fumes... BUT I MADE IT!

I'm seeing an increase in part counts across the board here. Zekes' dreks in the upper 500s, Scriptkitt3h's 810 part battleship, and a new battleship I'm working on has 600 parts and isn't even armed... Makes me wonder what effect lag has on missile effectiveness. Is it a defensive or offensive benefit?

For the first time my ships are NOT way bigger and more complex than everyone else's... I must be doing something right!

Edited October 15, 2014 by zekes

I'm seeing an increase in part counts across the board here. Zekes' dreks in the upper 500s, Scriptkitt3h's 810 part battleship, and a new battleship I'm working on has 600 parts and isn't even armed... Makes me wonder what effect lag has on missile effectiveness. Is it a defensive or offensive benefit?

Victory's in the lower 400s, with her armament. I'm going to try to add better armour and better weapons soon though.

EDIT: I'll add some drop tanks onto Victory's larger docking ports later and see if I can get to laythe, I mean, how hard can it be?

Edited October 15, 2014 by Megalodon 720
My warship is 381 parts yet is a similar size to the dreks, if not larger. I just don't get how you guys end up with such high part counts. :/

My warship is 381 parts yet is a similar size to the dreks, if not larger. I just don't get how you guys end up with such high part counts. :/

Lots of weapons. Lots and lots of glorious weapons...

Also, the SX-10's my only 810 part ship so far, and most of my older (and still 100% functional) designs are a bit easier on the RAM.

Victory's in the lower 400s, with her armament. I'm going to try to add better armour and better weapons soon though.

EDIT: I'll add some drop tanks onto Victory's larger docking ports later and see if I can get to laythe, I mean, how hard can it be?

so are we gonna have that battle soon?

Yep, I'm having internet problems so I might take a while on my turns.

Persistent

Edited October 15, 2014 by Megalodon 720

Yep, I'm having internet problems so I might take a while on my turns.

Persistent

Can I go first? I'm all set up...
Sure, I'm eager to see how long her armour lasts in a real battle.

I'm on my Laptop at school right now, so imgur is blocked But I shot two missiles into a Victory-Class... The first missile took out some armor in the center and threw the capsule into space (so the crew isn't dead, thankfully)... the second shot took out half her engines, and she's out of electricity, so she's dead. I'd have stolen her weapons but her docking ports are shielded and the weapons aren't reloadable... shame but you're down a ship.

PERSIST: http://www./download/63a2av9ord2bzpw/persistent.sfs

View Raw Image">

Edited October 15, 2014 by zekes

ahh...Zekes..

I found a problem with the drek XXV's design

ahh...Zekes..

I found a problem with the drek XXV's design

He already mentioned it

It's the XIV-V we need to bring down

DL link plz,

I think i can crack it.

BTW, pic of wreekedge
I've lost count of the Mks of Drek. They go by so quickly!

I would fight you! If we can raise max range to 3 km ( i REALLY don't want to be in load range of those ships; it would be much less laggy)

Sure, lemme set up a persist.

Also, I did test out the Drek (an older 0.25 variant, but still an 0.25 one) VS. my SX-10.

Drek shooting SX-10:

(I sadly forgot to take an aftermath pic, but the SX-10 survived, minus the upper bridge area, and with some of the cannon's hull plating screwed up. However, all fuel and other weapons were A-OK.)

SX-10 shooting Drek:

All in all, the Drek line is still tough-as nails, but they're not invuln (nor any any ships, for that matter).

The SX-10 is a tough son-of-a-gun, and the line should prove to be quite useful.

Bonus pic from testing:

Remember kids, this is why you NEVER spam spacebar when using a KSP warship.
Those explosions are incredible!
Seeing all these other ships that can survive multiple SRBs to the hull make me feel so inadequate.

DL link plz,

I think i can crack it.

BTW, pic of wreekedge

http://i.imgur.com/jDAKDHE.jpg

I know, the XXV has a big flaw, and that is the wing plating on top of the armor is thicker than the armor so the armor ends up getting clipped inside of it, which makes it much less stable. The XIV-V and XXVII are both wingless, so they are much less likely to crack (XIV-V is about 10% chance and XXVII is 5%, at least as far as my testing goes)

Sure, lemme set up a persist.

Also, I did test out the Drek (an older 0.25 variant, but still an 0.25 one) VS. my SX-10.

Drek shooting SX-10:

http://i.imgur.com/rWUUvSo.png

(I sadly forgot to take an aftermath pic, but the SX-10 survived, minus the upper bridge area, and with some of the cannon's hull plating screwed up. However, all fuel and other weapons were A-OK.)

SX-10 shooting Drek:

http://i.imgur.com/sOTfUSW.png

http://i.imgur.com/5R3BbsT.png

http://i.imgur.com/NEXHW3a.png

http://i.imgur.com/QwRikLi.png

All in all, the Drek line is still tough-as nails, but they're not invuln (nor any any ships, for that matter).

The SX-10 is a tough son-of-a-gun, and the line should prove to be quite useful.

Bonus pic from testing:

http://i.imgur.com/DhfUR7R.png

Remember kids, this is why you NEVER spam spacebar when using a KSP warship.

This will be an impressive slugging match XD
How do you place the wings above the armour? When you place them they always clip with the armour.

Seeing all these other ships that can survive multiple SRBs to the hull make me feel so inadequate.

Yeah, i was gonna say you have a problem with main armament on your Battleships, only two SRBs and about a dozen I-beams aren't gonna cut it for a 200 tonne ship, not to mention they're not reloadable...

How do you place the wings above the armour? When you place them they always clip with the armour.

the old wings used to not clip, i don't think... anyway clipping on armor is bad in general XD
So how could I place wings on Victory's hull without making it clip?

So how could I place wings on Victory's hull without making it clip?

lift it up off the armor with one of those light i-beams
Hmm, Ill try that. Also, sorry for not posting a turn yet, my slow internet means that I can't download the persist.
